text: The 2016–17 UEFA Champions League group stage started on 13th September and finished on 7th December 2016. There were 32 teams in the group stage, and they played to determine the 16 teams that would go on to the next round of the 2016–17 UEFA Champions League ==Teams== Key to colours Group winners and runners-up advanced to the round of 16 Third-placed teams entered the Europa League round of 32 {| class="wikitable" Team TH Real Madrid 176.142 1 Barcelona 159.142 2 Leicester City 15.256 3 Bayern Munich 163.035 4 Juventus 107.087 5 Benfica 116.616 6 Paris Saint-Germain 112.549 7 CSKA Moscow 48.716 ;Notes ==Groups== ===Group A=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group C=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group D=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group E=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group F=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group G=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group H=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Notes== ==References== Category:UEFA Champions League group stages Category:2016 in association football Category:September 2016 events Category:October 2016 events Category:November 2016 events Category:December 2016 events
title: 2016–17 UEFA Champions League group stage
